settings.title: THE TIME FOR CHANGE IS NOW
settings.content_html:
Hybrid Power Solutions was founded in 2015 in response to a pressing need for
safer, cleaner and more effective portable electric systems. Today, HPS designs and
manufactures patent pending portable battery systems and customized energy solutions
for a variety of industrial markets, including the mining, railway, public transit and construction sectors.

settings.title: WE'RE ON A MISSION TO USHER IN THE NEXT GENERATION OF PORTABLE POWER SOLUTIONS
WHO WE ARE
settings.text: Founded in 2015 in response to a pressing need for safer, cleaner and more effective portable electric systems, Hybrid Power Solutions produces patent pending portable battery systems and customized energy solutions for a variety of industrial markets, including the mining, construction, railway, marine and military sectors.  Built on a commitment to create and provide renewable, reusable green technology innovations, we are the go-to provider for battery solutions within Canada.

settings.title: WHAT WE DO
settings.text: The products we design and manufacture are safer, quieter and more efficient than any other alternative currently on the market. We built a business on a passion and a dream; to develop solutions that not only reduce emissions but provide countless other advantages. Our vision is to contribute to the long-term technical improvement and advancement of power technology in a variety of industrial sectors, while also improving the overall ROI for end users.

settings.title: OUR COMMITMENT TO YOU
settings.text: We pride ourselves on running an ethical business practice in a fast-passed high growth market. We are committed to listening to our customers and take real world action in the development of our products. Our team provides you not only a product but a solution. From portable generator replacements to powering mining vehicles, we provide end customers and OEMs’ what they need to transition to a reduced emission future.

settings.quote:
The Batt Pack provides great utility and convenience. It is well suited to almost all construction & industrial  tool applications and recreational activities that we have run into. Whether it be a large general contractor or engineering firm needing power to run tools on a site, or a municipality looking for sustainable back up power or a DJ needing to run their sensitive laptops, sound boards and speaker, the Batt Pack will run it all. The portability, no fumes and no noise and weather-ability make it ideal for interior or exterior applications. The unit recharges easily through a standard wall outlet and we love that it can go totally off grid with the solar panel plug in.

- Steve, Venture Accelerator Partners

The Batt Pack from HPS performs well on a job site. It is able to keep all of our batteries charged through the the day and is still 1/2 full at the end of the day. The durability and ease of the Batt Pack is also something to consider, it has a seemingly durable shell with high quality handles for easy transport. As for aesthetics and size, its approximately the same size as a small generator but looks way sleeker and is way cleaner.

- Elijah, Eden Yardworks

Francois and his team were a great help through the buying process and provided us with a fantastic tool. We highly recommend this company and look forward to doing more business with them in the future.

- Dennis, Eden Yardworks

settings.title: MADE IN ONTARIO
settings.position: We're honoured to be recognized among Ontario's 750,000+ manufacturing workers, who are some of the best in the world!   All of our products are proudly designed & manufactured in Etobicoke, Ontario.

settings.title: Can I recharge & discharge a power pack at the same time?
settings.text: Of course, that's no problem at all.

settings.title: How long does it take to charge a power pack?
settings.text:
For our base Batt Pack Energy model (2.5 kWh), it takes approximately 3 hours to reach a full charge from shore power. 

For the Batt Pack Energy extended range model or XP model (3.6 kWh), it will take approximately 5 hours to reach a full charge from shore power.

settings.title: How long does it take to charge off solar?
settings.text: This is highly dependent on the number of panels you decide to use. Based on connecting the maximum amount (780 W), you're looking at a 5-8 hour recharge time dependent on sun conditions.

settings.title: Where do you ship to? How much is shipping?
settings.text:
We offer free shipping within the US & Canada from our warehouse in Mississauga, Canada. There are no duties to import our products into the US. 

If you're looking to ship to an international address, please contact us for rates (sales@hybridps.ca).

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.text: We offer a 30 day return policy. All returns are subject to a 5% re-stocking fee and the customer is responsible for return shipping costs.

settings.title: Do the portable packs have a warranty?
settings.text: Yes! We offer a 6 month commercial warranty or 12 month standard warranty on everything. There is also a 2 year or 500 cycle warranty on the batteries, whatever comes first.

settings.title: How long will the portable power pack last?
settings.text: Check out our blog post on calculating run times or equipment table on the product page. You can also reach out to us at sales@hybridps.ca if you have any specific questions.

settings.title: Can I leave the power packs outside?
settings.text: Yes, our portable power packs are IP54 rated (weatherproof). But like anything else, it is best to bring them inside if you can, to reduce overall wear and tear.

settings.title: How long can you leave the power pack without charging?
settings.text: You can leave the power pack in storage mode with everything shut off for up to 3 months. If you require longer periods, you will need to top off to maintain battery health.

settings.title: How safe is this battery chemistry?
settings.text: We use the safest chemistry available on the marketing for lithium ion. We also use an ultra sophisticated BMS to prevent any accidents/issues before they can occur.

settings.title: What maintenance is required on the power packs?
settings.text: There is no maintenance required! However, if you are using the power pack in dusty conditions, we recommend using our vent filters.

settings.title: What is the typical lifespan of the power pack?
settings.text:
It's all dependent on the model, however across the board our power packs have 2,500 - 3,000 cycles. Each cycle consists of a complete discharge and recharge. 

The lifespan of the product will depend on overall usage and the frequency of running through cycles. We find that a power pack will typically last from 8-20 years. And even after those 2,500 - 3,000 cycles, the power pack will still operate, it will just have reduced performance (i.e. <80% of original). 

The typical pay back period on our products is 1-2 years when compared against traditional generators.

settings.title: How does the power pack compare against a generator?
settings.text:
Where do we even start? The power packs offer so many incredible benefits over traditional generations.

- Can be used indoors or outdoors
- All weather conditions
- No fuel and no maintenace
- No fumes
- Safer
- No pollution
- No noise
- Lighter
- Easier to use
- Lower cost of the life of the product

settings.title: What kind of applications can this be used for?
settings.text:
Backup Power
Construction
Railway
Transit
Mining 
Marine
Military
Events
Emergency Response

settings.title: Can the power packs be used to automatically power a circuit when the power goes off?
settings.text: Yes! Please speak to our team regarding the automatic transfer switch installation.

settings.title: Do you offer any bigger or smaller power pack options?
settings.text: Yes, we do offer custom power solutions. Please reach out to our team at sales@hybridps.ca

settings.title: GREEN, CLEAN POWER, WITH
settings.text_content: Our leading-edge products are built to last and will continue performing optimally for up to 15 years. From portable generator replacements to powering mining equipment, we provide our customers what they need to transition to a fuel-free future.

settings.title: RECREATIONAL
settings.contentbox:
Whether you're living your best #vanlife, setting sail on a new adventure, or simply a fan of the wide open road, the last thing you want is to be limited by power.

With our portable power packs, you don't have to worry about finding your next camp site to plug-in or nearest shore power port, you can now plug & play anywhere. From powering the microwave or hair dryer, or running your AC in the warmer months, you can have it all!

settings.title: Home & Off-Grid
settings.contentbox:
Designed with off-grid living in mind, the Power Tower offers 6000 W continuous power and up to 18,000 W of peak power. Coupled with 3,500W of Solar MPPT charging capability, the Power Tower ensures you are never left out in the dark.

Be prepared for the next power outage and avoid costly food spoilage, keep your lights on and devices charged with our revolutionary and lightweight Batt Pack Energy. This portable lithium ion battery system is designed to replace commercial and industrial grade generators. Ideal for any indoor or outdoor application, the Batt Pack Energy is exceptionally easy to use and delivers up to 4000 W of power.

settings.title: Financing
settings.titlebox: Pay for your purchase in monthly installments.

settings.title: getting off-grid has never been easier
settings.content_2: Introducing the Power Tower, a complete plug-and-play back-up power system for your home or cottage, beautifully enclosed in an elegant glass cabinet. This scalable off-grid solution provides up to 60kWh of battery storage to meet your unique energy needs.

FOR A REASON

settings.title: FUEL FREE POWER
settings.text_content: Our rugged, portable power packs offer a reliable alternative to traditional fuel powered generators. Made with the safest battery technology available on the market, our portable power packs are designed to last an entire workshift. They can be used indoors or outdoors and require absolutely no maintenance.

settings.text_heading:
Ensuring your crew's safety while on the site is our top priority.
All our systems are safe for use in tight, confined spaces,
and are designed to last an entire work shift

settings.text_heading: Our portable power packs are the perfect solution when access to power is needed in remote or hard to access areas.

settings.title: THE TIME FOR CHANGE IS NOW
settings.content_one: Things don't always go according to plan. Power outages can be a major inconvenience at the best of times, and downright scary at the worst. With our elegantly designed, safe and easy to use back-up power solutions, you'll never have to worry again. Small enough to fit in a closet, yet powerful enough to power a full-sized fridge for 2-3 days on one charge, our power packs are designed with your comfort and safety in mind.

settings.title: GET THE JOB DONE
settings.content_one:
Wherever your crew goes, they need dependable power. With the push of a button, light up your track and plug in anything from a grinder to a tie drill. The Batt Pack Energy is the ultimate power pack that enables you to power any 120V or 240V tools. No more expensive propriatary battery systems that cost thousands, this is the all weather power pack that works just as hard as you do while providing a maintenance free, plug and play operation. From signals to track crews, the needs are endless.

When you have something more specific or much larger in mind, our team of engineers are ready to design a battery system customized to your application. Fully battery power rail car? No problem. Three phase 20kw of power with no fuel, we've got you covered.

settings.title: RELIABLE & POWERFUL ENERGY
settings.content_one: The Batt Pack Energy was born from and for mining. In some cases having a payback period of 79 seconds! This is the tool that pays for itself. Avoid installing temporary power, setting up hundreds of feet of power cables or taking hours to get setup for a short job. The Batt Pack Energy is portable power wherever you need. Roll it in when you need and it swap it out with a fully charged unit when the other is depleted for continuous operation. We've spent years working with our mining customers to build a robust product as we listen to their demands. Mining is the benchmark industry for our products. If it can survive a mine, it can survive anything. This is AC power, wherever you need it with no fumes. Need DC power or more than 4000W of AC power? No problem! We provide custom battery solutions both big and small at a lower cost than the competition.

settings.title: THE TIME FOR CHANGE IS NOW
settings.content_one:
From small operations to the worlds biggest, transit crews work all over the city and in any condition. The Batt Pack Energy not only provides power for lighting and small tools but has enough power and surge capability to power coring drills and pumps. This isn't for the weekend warrior, this is for those who dependent on their equipment to get the job done and need all the power they can get. Proven on track and on the streets, our power packs power everything from saws to impact wrenches responding to bus breakdowns or subway track construction. With no fuel or fumes, your crew will never have to worry about carbon monoxide poisoning all while delivering ample power in small and portable package. Power with the push of a button for any application. These units have been a key part of transit operators equipment for years and continue to prove themselves in this market.

HPS also provides complete drop in battery solutions for all transit needs. Our team of engineers is ready to assist in transitioning your operation to going fully fuel free.

settings.title: BATTERY SOLUTIONS FOR MILITARY
settings.content_one: Our portable power packs are the perfect solution when access to power is needed in remote or hard to access areas. Small, lightweight and easy to store, our generator alternatives work just as well on a base as they do on the back of a truck. Best of all, our systems make no noise and produce no fumes, offering a safe and reliable alternative to other power sources. We also design custom, drop-in systems for military vehicles - contact us to find out more!

settings.text_content: When you're out enjoying a beautiful day on the water, the last thing you want to worry about is power. With a our portable, water-resistant power packs, you can get back to what you love.

settings.title: POWER YOUR ADVENTURES
settings.content_one: With our safe, lightweight, water resistant power packs, you can bring the convenience of shore power anywhere! Run your AC devices on the hottest of days, or keep you house batteries topped up. When it comes to making your boat look its best, you can use our Batt Pack to power your tools to grind, sand, buff and polish to perfection - all with no fumes and no noise. The best part? Our systems are compatible with most solar panels, making recharging a breeze!

settings.text_content: No one wants to deal with a power outage. But if there is one, make sure you're prepared with our best-in-class, safe and easy to use back-up power packs.

settings.home-featured-title: NO FUMES & SAFE FOR INDOOR USE

settings.Heading: EXPECT THE UNEXPECTED
settings.title: BACK-UP POWER SOLUTIONS
settings.content_one: Things don't always go according to plan. Power outages can be a major inconvenience at the best of times, and downright scary at the worst. With our elegantly designed, safe and easy to use back-up power solutions, you'll never have to worry again. Small enough to fit in a closet, yet powerful enough to power a full-sized fridge for 2-3 days on one charge, our power packs are designed with your comfort and safety in mind.

settings.title: THE NEXT GENERATION OF
settings.text_content:
Say goodbye to noise, fumes and fuel and hello to the future of clean energy.

Our revolutionary lightweight and portable lithium-ion battery packs are designed to deliver maximum power and high ROI, with little to no maintenance.

settings.title: THE POWER TOWER
settings.subheading: getting off-grid has never been easier
settings.text_content:
Introducing the Power Tower, a complete plug-and-play back-up power system for your home
or cottage, beautifully enclosed in an elegant glass cabinet. This scalable off-grid solution
provides up to 60kWh of battery storage to meet your unique energy needs.

settings.title: SAVE OVER 15% ON OUR BEST-SELLING BATTERIES!
settings.subheading: For a limited time only, you can save over 15% on our PT3.9 batteries.
settings.text_content: Made with the safest battery chemistry on the market, the LiFePO4 batteries offer a long-last energy storage system that weighs and takes up 3x less space than traditional lead-acid batteries.

settings.title: THE NEXT GENERATION OF

settings.content: Just wanted to reach out to express how grateful my wife and I are for our new power tower set up, as well as all the help you’ve provided along the way.   We ended up going with a second battery and a couple more panels after all, and the tower is currently keeping up with our consumption. We’re running our wifi, lights, charging multiple devices and even trickle charging a couple deep cycle marine batteries for back up situations, and it’s kept up with all of it today with a decent amount of sun this morning. Can’t wait to see how it does after we have our fireplace fan and hot water heater installed next week, but I can’t see it making much of a dent in our consumption at all. We are so happy that we’ve even started to consider a DC fridge instead of propane.   We really couldn’t be more grateful to have found your company through Levi. The amount of stress it has alleviated for us in the home stretch of the pregnancy really is invaluable. From the bottom of both our hearts, thank you for the time you’ve given up to troubleshoot, and of course the product itself.  I’d be happy to provide a positive customer testimonial at any time, so don’t hesitate to reach out if that’s something you’d be interested in.   Here are some pics of the new set up.

settings.heading: Steve G. |
settings.content: The BattPack provides great utility and convenience. It is well suited to almost all construction & industrial tool applications and recreational activities that we have run into. Whether it be a large general contractor or engineering firm needing power to run tools on a site, or a municipality looking for sustainable back up power or a DJ needing to run their sensitive laptops, sound boards, and speaker, the BattPack will run it all. The portability, no fumes, and no noise and weatherability make it ideal for interior or exterior applications. The unit recharges easily through a standard wall outlet and we love that it can go totally off grid with the solar panel plug in.

settings.heading: Elijah H
settings.content: “The BattPack from HPS performs well on a job site. It is able to keep all of our batteries charged through the day and is still 1/2 full at the end of the day. The durability and ease of the BattPack is also something to consider, it has a seemingly durable shell with high quality handles for easy transport. As for aesthetics and size, its approximately the same size as a small generator but looks way sleeker and is way cleaner.”

settings.title: NEED LESS THAN 2.5kWh
settings.text_11: RW2560ELC is a green, environmentally friendly, safe and portable energy storage product that provides you with a portable and sustainable green energy solution. It can be used in outdoor camping, outdoor aerial photography, expedition and rescue scenes. It can also power most household appliances, such as TVs, fans, blowers, refrigerators, even induction cookers and air conditioners, to meet your daily electricity needs all the time.

settings.title: SOLAR FRANCHISE OPPORTUNITY
settings.text_content:
There is something incredibly powerful about taking control of your own future. Maybe you’ve always known you were meant to be a part of something bigger, or maybe you’ve only recently discovered your entrepreneurial spark, whatever it is that drives you, we’re glad you made it.

As part of the Hybrid Power Solutions family, you will be leading the future of solar & energy storage installation. We are the only vertically integrated battery and solar system manufacturer in North America, and we’ve got your back from design and development to delivery and installation.

settings.title_last: The Future is Fuel FRee
settings.content_html:
There has never been a better time to get involved in solar and energy storage. As an HPS 
installer, you can count on growing demand to drive your business growth.

settings.title: WE’VE GOT YOU COVERED
settings.text_11:
Hybrid Power Solutions is the leading North American fuel-free portable power, solar & energy storage installation expert, connecting consumers and businesses across North America with access to clean and affordable energy for off-grid and net-metered purposes.

We design, develop and manufacture all Hybrid Power Solutions products in-house, offering our customers trusted national brand warranties and a seamless experience from pre to post installation.

With our simplified process and products, installers can reduce their installation times by up to 70%. And, by centralizing customer care and utilizing our proprietary platform, HPS hub, our installers gain more freedom and time to focus on what really matters.

settings.content_html:
No experience? No problem! Our entire process comes down to one thing -
providing you with the tools you need to succeed.

settings.title: JOIN THE REVOLUTION
settings.content: Subscribe to our newsletter to stay up to date with our all-in-one energy solutions.

settings.home-featured-title: Increase your profits & revenue by taking advantage of our buying power and the preferred discounts we pass on to our solar installers.
Maximize your efficiency and capacity by using HPS products that make install times simple and quick.
Say goodbye to admin work, and hello to more time & freedom with our proprietary HPS hub and centralized customer support.
Invest in your future and capitalize on the power of the HPS brand when you decide to sell.

settings.Heading:
DO YOU HAVE
WHAT IT TAKES?
settings.title: YOUR NEXT STEPS
settings.content_one: We are growing quickly and looking for new, hungry entrepreneurs to join our incredible team. We work hard and we play hard, and freedom is what drives us. With limited territories available throughout Canada, the time has never been better to get involved with solar. If you’re looking for an exciting new career opportunity where you’re in control, then we want to hear from you.

settings.text: The first step to your new journey starts here. Fill out the form below and our team will reach out to schedule an intro call to discuss the opportunity. We can’t wait to hearfrom you!

settings.title: EMBRACE A BRIGHTER FUTURE
settings.text_content: Are you tired of paying for high electricity bills or are you in an area without convenient access to power? Have you been thinking of installing a solar system on your property? Well, you’ve come to the right place. At Hybrid Power Solutions, we not only design, develop & produce all HPS products in-house, we also install them!

settings.title: RELIABLE, AFFORDABLE & CONVENIENT
settings.content_html: There has never been a better time to invest in solar. It is now more affordable than ever, especially with our incredible financing plans, and your off-grid or net-metered solar system can be up and running in no time.

settings.title: WE’VE GOT YOU COVERED
settings.text_11:
Hybrid Power Solutions is the leading North American fuel-free portable power, solar & energy storage installation expert, connecting consumers and businesses across North America with access to clean and affordable energy for off-grid and net-metered purposes.

We design, develop and manufacture all Hybrid Power Solutions products in-house, offering our customers trusted national brand warranties and a seamless experience from pre to post installation. All of our products undergo rigorous quality control testing to maximize performance and ensure regulatory compliance. With our vertically integrated approach, we cut out the middleman, ensuring we can offer our customers competitive cost savings and peace of mind.

PAY FOR YOUR SOLAR INVESTMENT
IN MONTHLY INSTALLMENTS
